application-versions.name: CloudVolumes Clustered WordPress Blog
application-versions.description: Three-tier CloudVolumes-enabled Wordpress application on Windows nodes; Apache HTTP Server for load balancer, Apache+PHP+Wordpress for application server (clustered), and MySQL Server for database server.

application.name: CloudVolumes Clustered WordPress Blog
application.description: CloudVolumes instantly provisioned Wordpress cluster: Apache HTTP Server, MySQL database, Apache load balancer, and Apache+PHP+Wordpress cluster

ns9:component-version-script.description: Install Apache HTTP Server on Windows 2008 R2 SP1.
ns9:component-version-script.script: echo Agent Install Dir: %AGENTDIR% echo running as %USERDOMAIN%\%USERNAME% if exist "%AGENTDIR%\svservice.exe" call "%AGENTDIR%\svservice.exe" attach apache_2.2.22.vmdk echo ERRORLEVEL is %ERRORLEVEL% exit /b 0

meta-tag-type.name: OS Family
meta-tag-type.description: Operating System (OS) Family.

supported-os-details.exec-script: @echo off call %1 >%3 2>&1 if NOT %errorlevel% EQU 0 exit %errorlevel% set > %2

supported-os-details.exec-script: @echo off call %1 >%3 2>&1 if NOT %errorlevel% EQU 0 exit %errorlevel% set > %2

ns9:component-version-script.script:
echo Using username %DBUSER% password %DBPASS%
echo GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON *.* TO '%DBUSER%'@'%' WITH GRANT OPTION > grant.sql
echo Executing MySQL with: type grant.sql
set PATH=%PATH%;%MYSQLDIR%\bin mysql --user=%DBUSER% --password=%DBPASS% < grant.sql
del /q /f grant.sql
echo ERRORLEVEL %ERRORLEVEL% exit /b 0

meta-tag-type.name: OS Family
meta-tag-type.description: Operating System (OS) Family.

supported-os-details.exec-script: @echo off call %1 >%3 2>&1 if NOT %errorlevel% EQU 0 exit %errorlevel% set > %2

ns9:component-version-script.script: net start mysql echo ERRORLEVEL %ERRORLEVEL% exit /b 0

ns9:component-version-script.script:
echo Creating start.bat in "%WAMPDIR%" echo @echo off > "%WAMPDIR%\start.bat" echo cd "%wampdir%" >> "%WAMPDIR%\start.bat" echo start /min .\wampmanager.exe >> "%WAMPDIR%\start.bat"
echo Creating wampmanager task schtasks /create /tn wampmanager /sc daily /ru system /tr "%WAMPDIR%\start.bat" /f schtasks /run /tn wampmanager rem schtasks /delete /tn wampmanager /f
echo ERRORLEVEL is %ERRORLEVEL% exit /b 0

ns9:component-version-script.script:
:waitagain if not exist "%WAMPDIR%" ( echo Waiting for %WAMPDIR% directory ping -n 2 127.0.0.1 >NUL goto :waitagain )
exit /b 0
